page.title: 10SCHOOL SUBJECTS
page.content:
At school we do many different subjects like{maths}and{language Maths might be{fractions, measuring}or {problems}and in language we do {spelling , grammer}and{stories.}For {art}we get{Mr Ford.}We used to get {singing}with{Mrs Waters}but she left and we dont have singing now. For{P.E we get{Mrs Milner}and we play{games, do{cartwheels, rolls}and{jumps.}We go {swimming}at{Turriff Swimming Pool}with {Mr Henry}who is the swimming instructor. We have made{films}called, {"The Lords Revenge"}and"{Pandora's {Box"}which won a prize in London. The school has a{Spectrum computer.} There are 26 pupils in the school, 12 in the older class which is 7 to 12 year olds and 14 in the Infant class.
{ By DUNCAN WISEMAN (Age 12)
